Item ID21622

Volcanic ash is obtained from mining ash piles found around the Fossil Island Volcano. Doing so requires level 22 in Mining, and grants 10 experience per drop, regardless of the number of ash mined at once.

They can also be obtained as drops from wyverns in the Wyvern Cave.

Contents

  • 1 Mining Info
  • 2 Yield
  • 3 Products
  • 4 Uses
  • 5 Item sources
    • 5.1 Shop locations
  • 6 Changes
  • 7 References

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Ash pile
Level required 22
Mining XP10 xp
RockAsh pile
Required toolPickaxe
Respawn time30 seconds

Yield[edit | edit source]

The amount of ash obtained is scaled to the player's Mining level, starting with one ash at level 22 and increasing by one for every 15 levels above 22, to a maximum of six ash at 97 (boosts can be used). Mining enhancers do not affect the yield when mining volcanic ash.[1] At high mining levels, it is possible to obtain over 6500 ash per hour.

Mining Level Ash Obtained
22 1
37 2
52 3
67 4
82 5
97 6

Uses[edit | edit source]

Volcanic ashes are used to create a variety of farming-related items.

  • Two can be used on a bucket of supercompost to create ultracompost.
  • 25 can be used on a compost bin and 50 on a Big Compost Bin, when the bins are completely filled with supercompost. This upgrades the supercompost into ultracompost.
  • One is used with a harralander potion (unf) to create a compost potion. This requires 22 Herblore.
  • If players have read the ash covered tome, they can have the Fertile Soil spell treat a farming patch with ultracompost instead of supercompost by casting the spell while having two volcanic ash in their inventory.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 February 2019
(update | poll)

Volcanic ash now dropped by Fossil and Ancient Wyverns. Volcanic ash obtained by mining now scaled to Mining level.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 9 September 2017. (Archived from the original on 25 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "[Do Varrock armor, mining cape and mining gloves affect mining volcanic ash?] No."

[[File:Volcanic ash detail.png|left|200px]]
'''Volcanic ash''' is obtained from mining [[ash pile]]s found around the [[Fossil Island Volcano]]. Doing so requires level 22 in [[Mining]], and grants 10 experience per drop, regardless of the number of ash mined at once.

They can also be obtained as drops from [[wyvern]]s in the [[Wyvern Cave]].

==Mining Info==
{{Mining info
|name = Ash pile
|level = 22
|xp = 10
|rock = [[Ash pile]]
|tool = [[Pickaxe]]
|time = 30 seconds
}}
==Yield==
The amount of ash obtained is scaled to the player's [[Mining]] level, starting with one ash at level 22 and increasing by one for every 15 levels above 22, to a maximum of six ash at 97 (boosts can be used). [[Mining enhancers]] '''do not''' affect the yield when mining volcanic ash.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/906484443271061504|date=9 September 2017|archiveurl=https://archive.is/w53qH|archivedate=25 May 2020|quote=[Do Varrock armor, mining cape and mining gloves affect mining volcanic ash?] No.}} At high mining levels, it is possible to obtain over 6500 ash per hour.

==Products==
{{Uses material list|Volcanic ash}}

==Uses==
Volcanic ashes are used to create a variety of farming-related items.

*Two can be used on a bucket of [[supercompost]] to create [[ultracompost]].
*25 can be used on a [[compost bin]] and 50 on a [[Big Compost Bin]], when the bins are completely filled with supercompost. This upgrades the supercompost into [[ultracompost]].
*One is used with a [[harralander potion (unf)]] to create a [[compost potion]]. This requires 22 [[Herblore]].
*If players have read the [[ash covered tome]], they can have the [[Fertile Soil]] spell treat a [[Farming/Patch locations|farming patch]] with [[ultracompost]] instead of [[supercompost]] by casting the spell while having two volcanic ash in their inventory.
